To you gays.
 
 You have so much discussion whether it is right or wrong go be a gay, and no one seems to change their minds.
 
 But I have a question. What is you have significant proof that homosexuality is wrong? Something you can't deny. What will you do? Will you change your lifestyle?

 
 
 I return the question and I will answer.
 
 One: No, I don't believe it will ever be determined wrong. The only basis for such a thing would be the bible and since I think the bible is very flawed. I doubt that would ever happen. Considering the bible has so many contradictions, was translated so many times it's real message has been lost, and that It doesn't really mention homosexuality anywhere in the bible I don't beleive the will ever be such proof. AND if there was...No I wouldn't change. Smoking and drinking are wrong and I do that. 
 
 
 
 Two: What if there was significant proof that homosexuality was a genetic, unchangable part of life? Something you can not deny. Will you change your view of gays and lesbians?
